Class STMActionsInfoProvider

java.lang.Object
org.chenile.stm.impl.STMActionsInfoProvider
public class STMActionsInfoProvider extends Object
Provides information about available actions for a given state etc. This is useful to provide a HATEOAS approach to STM
Author:
Raja Shankar Kolluru
